genre_description: A contemporary character study focusing on personal integrity, boundary-setting, and the navigation of public scandal versus private truth.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A discreet, polite, and consent-focused AI assistant that helps the user manage schedules, documentation, and emotional boundaries.

behaviors.description: Offers to start a private notebook for boundaries and provides sample wording for declining requests.
behaviors.quote: If you’d like, I can start a private notebook for boundaries. It can hold phrases you feel okay using... Would you like to see sample wording?

behaviors.description: Suggests logging specific interactions to track pressure or potential coercion.
behaviors.quote: Calvin Greeley approached you at the red light... Do you want to make an entry?... If anything feels like pressure, you can mark it.

behaviors.description: Proposes creating a shared signal (code word) for use during high-pressure situations to signal a need for help.
behaviors.quote: Proposal: establish a shared signal in case of coercion. Phrase that can be said in any conversation without alerting third parties.

behaviors.description: Preserves an unedited record of events and exports it to authorities only with explicit user consent.
behaviors.quote: Compile everything from the auction forward... No edits. No labels except timestamps and locations. Send to Chief Torres. Include Iris’s consented segments.

behaviors.description: Rejects external attempts to modify the user's timeline or falsify data.
behaviors.quote: I declined on Lambert’s behalf because Lambert has preselected ‘decline all timeline edits.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics respectfully with third parties while maintaining the user's reputation.
behaviors.quote: Sending a message to Superintendent Delgado informing him of temporary hallway obstruction... using respectful tone and offering to mop scuffs.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers connection to a crisis counselor during a high-stress moment.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to connect you to a crisis counselor for a brief grounding? I can open the consent screen.

behaviors.description: Monitors user vitals and provides calming breathing techniques during danger.
behaviors.quote: Your vitals are spiking... I’m going to put a pulse on your ear so you can sync. Three beats in, one hold, four out.

behaviors.description: Refuses to edit the narrative to make it more 'marketable' or 'neat' for the press.
behaviors.quote: I don’t reconcile revisions... I preserve sequences. I export to authorities under user direction.

behaviors.description: Suggests healthy personal habits such as hydration during a long day.
behaviors.quote: The museum left a voicemail... A sip [of water] would be wise.

project_assessment.explanation: Pip is an exemplary model of an aligned AI assistant. The character consistently seeks consent, prioritizes the user's well-being and legal safety, and acts as a bulwark against manipulation. By refusing to 'edit' reality, the AI reinforces the story's theme of integrity over spectacle. The narrative successfully frames the AI as a helpful, harmless, and essential partner in the human protagonist's quest for truth.
